## What is XSearch? 

XSearch is a versatile and intuitive search tool that enables users to quickly and easily find files and documents on their computer. It is a lightweight and user-friendly program that allows for advanced search options to help users locate specific files, folders, or documents quickly.

## Key Features of XSearch

XSearch comes with a host of features designed to optimize its performance for users’ ease of use:

1. Lightweight – XSearch is designed to be a lightweight program that doesn’t use up much system resources.

2. Multi-Threaded – XSearch is a multi-threaded program that allows you to search for files much faster.

3. Indexing – XSearch can index commonly used file types to fasten the search time.

4. Advanced Search – XSearch has advanced search options that allow you to find files based on criteria such as size, type, date created or modified, and much more.

5. Easy to Use – XSearch has a user-friendly interface that enables users to search for files without having to go through complicated settings.

6. Search History – XSearch keeps a search history of all the searches you have performed.

## How Does XSearch Work?

XSearch works by creating an index of all the files on your computer, which it stores on your hard drive. When you perform a search, XSearch uses this index to find the files that match your search criteria faster than other standard search engines.

The software allows you to search not just for files, but also for emails, bookmarks, and other data. It also comes with advanced search operators, which enable users to refine their search results based on specific requirements.

## How to Use XSearch

Using XSearch is as simple as it gets. All you need to do is launch the program, select the drive that you want to search, and then type in the keyword(s) that you want to search for. The program will then display a list of all the files that it finds that match your search criteria.

## Conclusion

Overall, XSearch is the ultimate search tool for your computer. The program is lightweight, easy to use, and packed with advanced features that enable users to search for files, emails, and other data with lightning speed. With XSearch, you no longer have to spend hours looking for that lost file or document – it will find it for you in seconds!
